definition: role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: jue2 se4 ban4 yan3 you2 xi4

sentences.english: Some of the authorization roles mandate that people are assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 一些授权角色是必不可少的，这些角色上分配了人员。

sentences.english: Some of the authorization roles mandate that people are assigned to them.
sentences.chinese: 一些授权角色是必不可少的，这些角色上分配了人员。

sentences.english: Direct your actors to stay in character. Ask them to study their characters.
sentences.chinese: 指导你的演员入戏，要他们研究角色。

sentences.english: Governance plays an important role in Program Management.
sentences.chinese: 治理在程序管理中扮演重要角色。

sentences.english: Managers may disown their part in the appraisal system.
sentences.chinese: 管理者也许会否认在业绩排名系统里面的角色。

sentences.english: Therefore, HR becomes a kind of pass-through in the information cycle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人力资源人员在信息循环中承担传递的角色。

sentences.english: This makes testing an integral part of the activities associated with this role.
sentences.chinese: 这就使得测试成为与此角色相关联活动的主要部分。

sentences.english: Players can also fine-tune their characters' clothing, size and expressions.
sentences.chinese: 玩家也能自由调整他们角色的服饰，体型和外表。

sentences.english: In a larger company, you would assign these roles to specific user groups.
sentences.chinese: 在较大的公司中，会将这些角色分配给特定的用户组。

sentences.english: Do you think China should play the role of an arbitrator in the dispute between India and Pakistan ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为中方是否应该在印巴冲突中充当调解者的角色？

sentences.english: What role does it play within our perception of reality?
sentences.chinese: 在我们的现实视角中它又扮演了什么角色？

sentences.english: These scenes where the characters actually are running for their lives are terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 这些角色正在为他们的生命奔跑的场景实在可怕。

sentences.english: Have you been tapped for any other voice roles this season or next?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有为这一季或下一季的其他角色配过音？

sentences.english: Later she scored a few guest-starring roles.
sentences.chinese: 后来她又得到了一些客串的角色。

sentences.english: I have been a walk-on for two years and haven't got a real character.
sentences.chinese: 我演配角两年了，一直没得到个真正的角色。

definition: to play the role of/to act
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
supporting role (in play, film etc)/minor role/to play a secondary role (in business etc)/to play second fiddle
(of an actor) to bring (one's character) to life/to act brilliantly
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
to model/to mold/(fig.) to create (a character, a market, an image etc)/(literature) to portray (in words)
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
